item.title: Three students among four killed in road accident in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Four people, including three students, were killed and ten others were injured when their vehicle overturned in Sindhanur district.
At least four persons including three students were killed and ten others injured when the vehicle they were travelling in overturned in the wee hours of Wednesday in this district, police said.
The vehicle was carrying students of Mantralaya Sanskrit Pathashala were on a pilgrimage to Hampi to offer prayers at Narahari Temple....]]>

item.title: 3 Students Among 4 Killed, 10 Injured After Vehicle Overturned in Raichur
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: At least four persons including three students were killed and ten others injured when the vehicle they were travelling in overturned in the wee hours of Wednesday in this district, police said.
The vehicle was carrying students of Mantralaya Sanskrit Pathashala were on a pilgrimage to Hampi to offer prayers at Narahari Temple. Police said the accident occurred near Araginamara Camp in Sindhanur.
Deceased students have been identified as Aryavandan (18), Sucheendra (22) and Abhilash (...]]>
item.author: Press Trust Of India

item.title: Raichur: Min. Gundu Rao warns of disciplinary action against negligent government hospital doctors
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: Min. Gundu Rao warns of disciplinary action against negligent government hospital doctors
Vartha Bharati | 22-01-2025 | 18:22:00 IST
Raichur: Health and Family Welfare Minister Dinesh Gundu Rao issued a stern warning to doctors and staff in taluka hospitals, emphasizing the importance of their presence at duty stations to provide necessary care for pregnant women. He cautioned that disciplinary action would be taken against those found negligent.
Speaking at the launch of the sta...]]>
item.author: Vartha Bharathi

item.title: Raichur District Accidents: CM Siddaramaiah announces Rs 3 lakh compensation for road accident victims' families, ET HealthWorld

Bengaluru: Karnataka Chief Minister Siddaramaiah has announced a compensation of Rs three lakh each to the next of kin of those who died in the two separate road accidents in Uttara Kannada, Raichur districts on Wednesday morning. In the Uttara Kannada accident, 11 people died and ...]]>
